diplomas.description: 5-year engineering qualification in Computer Science and Management. Equivalent to a MSC. Eng.
diplomas.skills: Web development, Databases, Architecture, OOP, Project management, Accounting

diplomas.description: Equivalent to 2 years of Preparatory Classes leading to a place in one of Polytech’s highly selective Engineering Schools (a place on the 2-year course is obtained after selection and competitive exam).
